price: Akasema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Hakika watu wangu wamenikanusha.
footnotes: Nuhu kuonyesha kushikilia watu wake kuukadhibisha wito wake, alisema: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Hakika watu wangu wamenikanusha! Kuthibitisha kuwa wanastahiki maapizo yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
